headline: CTI CRYOGENICS CONTROLLER FOR ON-BOARD HIGH VACUUM PUMP
description: Controller for use with On-Board High Vacuum Pump
specstable:
Manufacturer CTI Cryogenics
Model 8010
Description Controller for use with On-Board High Vacuum Pump
Other Information For use with CTI 8500, 1020R or SC Compressor
Operates on three phase or single phase
Operates up to three On-Board cryopumps
Part number: 8052261
Power Requirements 230/460 V 50/60 Hz
Exterior Dimensions
Width 13.250 in (33.7 cm)
Depth 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Height 5.750 in (14.6 cm)
Weight 18 lb (8 kg)
